definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: And the numbers are rising at the same time crime rates are dropping.
sentences.chinese: 被盤查的人數正在上升，同時犯罪率在下降。

sentences.english: SLEUTHS are stalking the corridors of London's National Gallery.
sentences.chinese: 偵探們正在敦國家美術館的走廊裏盤查。

sentences.english: During one journey, the fishing boat was boarded by a North Korean naval patrol.
sentences.chinese: 有一次漁船遭遇朝鮮海軍巡邏艇盤查。

sentences.english: Clubs that had operated with impunity are suddenly having trouble with their licenses.
sentences.chinese: 一些平常不受盤查的俱樂部突然在執照上遇到麻煩。

definition: (of police etc) to stop (sb) for inspection/to pull (sb) over
to search for and seize (criminals, smuggled goods etc)
to bring to justice/to hand over to the law
to bring to justice/to punish according to the law
